resource.description: Specifies the configuration data for a registered hook in CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: TypeArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type without version number.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type without version number.

properties.name: TypeName
properties.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

type.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

properties.name: Configuration
properties.description: The configuration data for the extension, in this account and region.

type.description: The configuration data for the extension, in this account and region.

properties.name: ConfigurationAlias
properties.description: An alias by which to refer to this extension configuration data.

type.description: An alias by which to refer to this extension configuration data.

attributes.description: Specifies the configuration data for a registered hook in CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: ConfigurationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration data, in this account and region.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration data, in this account and region.
